root: ^I'm doing wonderful myself! Look at these beautiful mushroom I just found in the market! Aren't they just adorbs?
^Well, shall we head back to the guildhouse and get breakfast cooking? It's going to be a delicious breakfast today!
^Breakfast, breakfast! Everyone, please come down for breakfast!
^M-mushroom onigiri... are you out of your mind? Why can't we have meat?!
^Every day it's nothing but veggie and veggies!
^Mmmmmmmmmmmm! Delish! I can eat a lot of this in a day!
^And Kyaru, you have to eat some vegetables in order to stay healthy, you know?
